QuestData.Title: Boarded!
QuestData.Description: Glad to see you survived the crash. Unfortunately, so did most of the enemy's boarding party.$B$BJust the thought of those monsters setting foot on my ship makes me sick. Wipe them out, $p. For my crew... For King Wrynn...$B$BFor the Alliance!
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay $1oa Forsaken Bat-Riders or Forsaken Deathstalkers.
QuestData.CompletionText: There will be no peace with those monsters running free.
QuestData.RewardText: Don't worry about the ship - it's just wood and metal.$B$BThe Skyfire lives on as long as we keep fighting.
